title: Herbal Supplements | Homeopathic Remedies | Louisville, KY
description: Find your nutrition and digestion experts at Brady Chiropractic & Wellness Center in Louisville, KY. Call or visit us for more details.
cleaned_text: Let the team at Brady Chiropractic & Wellness Center assist your body to heal naturally with our chiropractic services. Preventive healthcare is a powerful combination of good health and nutritious diets coupled with rest, exercise, and spinal adjustments. For optimum functioning, your body should have all the essential nutrients such as carbohydrates, fats, minerals, proteins, and various vitamins. This helps you achieve homeostasis, which simply means a stable inner environment in a changing external environment. Our nutritional and herbal supplements ensure healthy digestion, metabolization, and excretion. Talk to our experts today. If you have a poor diet that includes sugars and fats, you may have health issues such as diabetes, heart disease, and certain cancers. We'll help you change your food habits to something more healthy for your body type.
